column1: "New Policy Announcement: Travel and Expense","To all employees, please be advised of a new policy regarding travel and expense reimbursement that will take effect on the first of next month. The updated guidelines aim to provide more clarity and efficiency in the reimbursement process. Key changes include a revised meal allowance structure, a new streamlined process for submitting receipts through our mobile app, and a requirement for pre-approving all air travel expenses exceeding a certain threshold. The complete updated policy document is attached for your review. We encourage you to familiarize yourself with these changes before your next business trip to ensure a smooth and timely reimbursement."
